ForesToolboxRS 0.2.0

Reference

All functions

calkmeans()

Calibrating kmeans

calmla()

Calibrating supervised classification in Remote Sensing

coverChange()

Gain and loss in the land cover classification

endm

Signatures data

fusionRS()

Fusion of images with different observation geometries

gevi()

Greenness Vegetation Index (GEVI)

img_l8

A landsat 8 image I

img_optical

A landsat 8 image II

img_radar

A Sentinel-1 image

indices()

Remote sensing spectral indices

linearTrend()

Linear Trend in Remote Sensing

mla()

Supervised and unsupervised classification in Remote Sensing

ndfiSMA()

Normalized Difference Fraction Index (NDFI)

plot(<calkmeans>)

Plot of the "calkmeans" class

plot(<pvts>)

Plot of the "pvts" class

print(<fusionRS>)

Print of the "fusionRS" class

print(<mla>)

Print of the "mla" class

print(<pvts>)

Print of the "pvts" class

pvts()

Change detection using the PVts-\(\beta\) approach

pvtsRaster()

Change detection using the PVts-\(\beta\) approach (raster version)

rkmeans()

Unsupervised classification - kmeans

serie_pv

A CLASlite example

sma()

Spectral Mixture Analysis (SMA)

smootH()

Smoothing time series

tct()

Tasseled Cap Transformation (TCT)
